text:
Things you need to worry about in 2022?

Zombie servers which are doing no useful work but costing you a buckload of money. This is where #finops come in to figure out who in your company forgot to turn off their cloud. This and more, according to @holly_cummins https://t.co/XNF0TGC6Gg

author.description: #GOTOcon gathers and presents the brightest minds in tech.
